info.title: OSI4IOT DEMO Platform
info.description: Open source integration for internet of things

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Platform authentication - Default role required: User

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Management of organizations in the IOT Platform - Default role required: Organization_Admin

tags.name: Building
tags.description: Management of buildings in the IOT Platform - Role required: Platform_Admin

tags.name: Group
tags.description: Management of groups in organizations of the IOT Platform - Default role required: Group_Admin

tags.name: Device
tags.description: Management of devices in groups of an organization of the IOT Platform - Default role required: Group_Admin

tags.name: Topic
tags.description: Management of topics of devices of the IOT Platform - Default role required: Group_Admin

tags.name: Measurement
tags.description: Management of measurements of sensors of the IOT Platform - Default role required: Group_Admin

tags.name: Digital twin
tags.description: Management of digital twin of devices of the IOT Platform - Default role required: Group_Admin

tags.name: Dashboard
tags.description: List of dashboards of the IOT Platform - Default role required: Group_Admin

tags.name: Node-RED instances
tags.description: List of Node-RED instances of the IOT Platform - Default role required: Group_Admin
